ssht_test.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 // SSHT package to perform spin spherical harmonic transforms
00002 // Copyright (C) 2011  Jason McEwen
00003 // See LICENSE.txt for license details
00004 
00018 #include <stdio.h>
00019 #include <stdlib.h>
00020 #include <complex.h>
00021 #include <fftw3.h>  // Must be before fftw3.h
00022 #include <time.h>
00023 
00024 #include <ssht.h>
00025 
00026 #define NREPEAT 5
00027 #define MAX(a,b) ((a) > (b) ? (a) : (b))
00028 
00029 double ran2_dp(int idum);
00030 void ssht_test_gen_flm_complex(complex double *flm, int L, int spin, int seed);
00031 void ssht_test_gen_flm_real(complex double *flm, int L, int seed);
00032 
00033 
00034 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00035 
00036   complex double *flm_orig, *flm_syn;
00037   complex double *f_mw, *f_mw_ss, *f_gl, *f_dh;
00038   double *f_mw_real, *f_mw_ss_real, *f_gl_real, *f_dh_real;
00039 
00040   complex double *f_mw_pole, *f_mw_ss_pole;
00041   complex double f_mw_sp, f_mw_ss_np, f_mw_ss_sp;
00042   double *f_mw_real_pole, *f_mw_ss_real_pole;
00043   double f_mw_real_sp, f_mw_ss_real_sp, f_mw_ss_real_np, phi_sp, phi_np;
00044 
00045   ssht_dl_method_t dl_method = SSHT_DL_RISBO;
00046   int L = 128;
00047   int spin = 0;
00048   int irepeat;
00049   int seed = 1;
00050   int verbosity = 0;
00051   int i;
00052   double tmp;
00053 
00054   clock_t time_start, time_end;
00055   double errors_mw[NREPEAT];
00056   double errors_mw_pole[NREPEAT];
00057   double errors_mw_ss[NREPEAT];
00058   double errors_mw_ss_pole[NREPEAT];
00059   double errors_gl[NREPEAT];
00060   double errors_dh[NREPEAT];
00061   double errors_mw_real[NREPEAT];
00062   double errors_mw_real_pole[NREPEAT];
00063   double errors_mw_ss_real[NREPEAT];
00064   double errors_mw_ss_real_pole[NREPEAT];
00065   double errors_gl_real[NREPEAT];
00066   double errors_dh_real[NREPEAT];
00067   double durations_forward_mw[NREPEAT];
00068   double durations_inverse_mw[NREPEAT];
00069   double durations_forward_mw_pole[NREPEAT];
00070   double durations_inverse_mw_pole[NREPEAT];
00071   double durations_forward_mw_ss[NREPEAT];
00072   double durations_inverse_mw_ss[NREPEAT];
00073   double durations_forward_mw_ss_pole[NREPEAT];
00074   double durations_inverse_mw_ss_pole[NREPEAT];
00075   double durations_forward_gl[NREPEAT];
00076   double durations_inverse_gl[NREPEAT];
00077   double durations_forward_dh[NREPEAT];
00078   double durations_inverse_dh[NREPEAT];
00079   double durations_forward_mw_real[NREPEAT];
00080   double durations_inverse_mw_real[NREPEAT];
00081   double durations_forward_mw_real_pole[NREPEAT];
00082   double durations_inverse_mw_real_pole[NREPEAT];
00083   double durations_forward_mw_ss_real[NREPEAT];
00084   double durations_inverse_mw_ss_real[NREPEAT];
00085   double durations_forward_mw_ss_real_pole[NREPEAT];
00086   double durations_inverse_mw_ss_real_pole[NREPEAT];
00087   double durations_forward_gl_real[NREPEAT];
00088   double durations_inverse_gl_real[NREPEAT];
00089   double durations_forward_dh_real[NREPEAT];
00090   double durations_inverse_dh_real[NREPEAT];
00091 
00092   // Parse problem sizes.
00093   L = atoi(argv[1]);
00094   spin = atoi(argv[2]);
00095 
00096   // Allocate memory.
00097   flm_orig = (complex double*)calloc(L*L, sizeof(complex double));
00098   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(flm_orig)
00099   flm_syn = (complex double*)calloc(L*L, sizeof(complex double));
00100   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(flm_syn)
00101   f_mw = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00102   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_mw)
00103   f_mw_ss = (complex double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
00104   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_mw_ss)
00105   f_mw_pole = (complex double*)calloc((L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00106   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_mw_pole)
00107   f_mw_ss_pole = (complex double*)calloc((L-1)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
00108   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_mw_ss_pole)
00109   f_gl = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00110   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_gl)
00111   f_dh = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00112   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_dh)
00113   f_mw_real = (double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(double));
00114   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_mw_real)
00115   f_mw_ss_real = (double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(double));
00116   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_mw_ss_real)
00117   f_mw_real_pole = (double*)calloc((L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(double));
00118   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_mw_real_pole)
00119   f_mw_ss_real_pole = (double*)calloc((L-1)*(2*L), sizeof(double));
00120   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_mw_ss_real_pole)
00121   f_gl_real = (double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(double));
00122   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_gl_real)
00123   f_dh_real = (double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L-1), sizeof(double));
00124   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_dh_real)
00125 
00126   // Write program name.
00127   printf("\n");
00128   printf("SSHT test program (C implementation)\n");
00129   printf("================================================================\n");
00130 
00131   // Run algorithm error and timing tests.
00132   for (irepeat = 0; irepeat < NREPEAT; irepeat++) {
00133 
00134     // If spin=0 run tests on algorithms optimised for real spin=0 signal.
00135     if (spin == 0) {
00136 
00137       // =========================================================================
00138       // DH real spin=0
00139       printf("DH real test no. %d\n", irepeat);
00140 
00141       ssht_test_gen_flm_real(flm_orig, L, seed);
00142       time_start = clock();
00143       ssht_core_dh_inverse_sov_real(f_dh_real, flm_orig, L, verbosity);
00144       time_end = clock();
00145       durations_inverse_dh_real[irepeat] =
00146         (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00147       
00148       time_start = clock();
00149       ssht_core_dh_forward_sov_real(flm_syn, f_dh_real, L, verbosity);
00150       time_end = clock();
00151       durations_forward_dh_real[irepeat] =
00152         (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00153 
00154       errors_dh_real[irepeat] = 0.0;
00155       for (i = 0; i < L*L; i++)
00156         errors_dh_real[irepeat] =
00157           MAX(cabs(flm_orig[i] - flm_syn[i]), errors_dh_real[irepeat]);
00158 
00159       printf(" duration_inverse (s) = %40.4f\n",
00160              durations_inverse_dh_real[irepeat]);
00161       printf(" duration_forward (s) = %40.4f\n",
00162              durations_forward_dh_real[irepeat]);
00163       printf(" error                = %40.5e\n\n",
00164              errors_dh_real[irepeat]);
00165 
00166       // =========================================================================
00167       // GL real spin=0
00168       printf("GL real test no. %d\n", irepeat);
00169 
00170       ssht_test_gen_flm_real(flm_orig, L, seed);
00171       time_start = clock();
00172       ssht_core_gl_inverse_sov_real(f_gl_real, flm_orig, L, verbosity);
00173       time_end = clock();
00174       durations_inverse_gl_real[irepeat] =
00175         (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00176 
00177       time_start = clock();
00178       ssht_core_gl_forward_sov_real(flm_syn, f_gl_real, L, verbosity);
00179       time_end = clock();
00180       durations_forward_gl_real[irepeat] =
00181         (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00182 
00183       errors_gl_real[irepeat] = 0.0;
00184       for (i = 0; i < L*L; i++)
00185         errors_gl_real[irepeat] =
00186           MAX(cabs(flm_orig[i] - flm_syn[i]), errors_gl_real[irepeat]);
00187 
00188       printf(" duration_inverse (s) = %40.4f\n",
00189              durations_inverse_gl_real[irepeat]);
00190       printf(" duration_forward (s) = %40.4f\n",
00191              durations_forward_gl_real[irepeat]);
00192       printf(" error                = %40.5e\n\n",
00193              errors_gl_real[irepeat]);
00194 
00195       // =========================================================================
00196       // MW real spin=0
00197       printf("MW real test no. %d\n", irepeat);
00198 
00199       ssht_test_gen_flm_real(flm_orig, L, seed);
00200       time_start = clock();
00201       ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_real(f_mw_real, flm_orig, L, 
00202                                         dl_method, verbosity);      
00203       time_end = clock();
00204       durations_inverse_mw_real[irepeat] = 
00205         (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00206       
00207       time_start = clock();
00208       ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_real(flm_syn, f_mw_real, L, 
00209                                              dl_method, verbosity);      
00210       time_end = clock();
00211       durations_forward_mw_real[irepeat] = 
00212         (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00213 
00214       errors_mw_real[irepeat] = 0.0;
00215       for (i = 0; i < L*L; i++)
00216         errors_mw_real[irepeat] = 
00217           MAX(cabs(flm_orig[i] - flm_syn[i]), errors_mw_real[irepeat]);
00218 
00219       printf(" duration_inverse (s) = %40.4f\n", 
00220              durations_inverse_mw_real[irepeat]);
00221       printf(" duration_forward (s) = %40.4f\n", 
00222              durations_forward_mw_real[irepeat]);
00223       printf(" error                = %40.5e\n\n", 
00224              errors_mw_real[irepeat]);
00225 
00226       // =========================================================================
00227       // MW real spin=0 pole
00228       printf("MW real pole test no. %d\n", irepeat);
00229 
00230       ssht_test_gen_flm_real(flm_orig, L, seed);
00231       time_start = clock();
00232       ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_real_pole(f_mw_real_pole,
00233                                              &f_mw_real_sp,
00234                                              flm_orig, L,
00235                                              dl_method, verbosity);
00236       time_end = clock();
00237       durations_inverse_mw_real_pole[irepeat] =
00238         (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00239       
00240       time_start = clock();
00241       ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_real_pole(flm_syn, f_mw_real_pole,
00242                                                   f_mw_real_sp,
00243                                                   L,
00244                                                   dl_method, verbosity);
00245       time_end = clock();
00246       durations_forward_mw_real_pole[irepeat] =
00247         (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00248 
00249       errors_mw_real_pole[irepeat] = 0.0;
00250       for (i = 0; i < L*L; i++)
00251         errors_mw_real_pole[irepeat] =
00252           MAX(cabs(flm_orig[i] - flm_syn[i]), errors_mw_real_pole[irepeat]);
00253 
00254       printf(" duration_inverse (s) = %40.4f\n",
00255              durations_inverse_mw_real_pole[irepeat]);
00256       printf(" duration_forward (s) = %40.4f\n",
00257              durations_forward_mw_real_pole[irepeat]);
00258       printf(" error                = %40.5e\n\n",
00259              errors_mw_real_pole[irepeat]);
00260

00264

00489       (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00490 
00491     time_start = clock();
00492     ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_ss_pole(flm_syn, f_mw_ss_pole,
00493                                               f_mw_ss_np, phi_np,
00494                                               f_mw_ss_sp, phi_sp,
00495                                               L, spin,
00496                                               dl_method, verbosity);
00497     time_end = clock();
00498     durations_forward_mw_ss_pole[irepeat] =
00499       (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00500 
00501     errors_mw_ss_pole[irepeat] = 0.0;
00502     for (i = 0; i < L*L; i++)
00503         errors_mw_ss_pole[irepeat] =
00504           MAX(cabs(flm_orig[i] - flm_syn[i]), errors_mw_ss_pole[irepeat]);
00505

00511            errors_mw_ss_pole[irepeat]);
00512   
00513   }

00642 
00643 
00655 void ssht_test_gen_flm_real(complex double *flm, int L, int seed) {
00656 
00657   int el, m, msign, i, i_op;
00658 
00659   for (el=0; el<L; el++) {
00660     m = 0;
00661     ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&i, el, m);
00662     flm[i] = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00663     for (m=1; m<=el; m++) {
00664       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&i, el, m);
00665       flm[i] = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0) + I * (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00666       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&i_op, el, -m);
00667       msign = m & 1;
00668       msign = 1 - msign - msign; // (-1)^m
00669       flm[i_op] = msign * conj(flm[i]);
00670     }
00671   }
00672 
00673 }
00674 
00675 
00688 void ssht_test_gen_flm_complex(complex double *flm, int L, int spin, int seed) {
00689 
00690   int i, i_lo;
00691 
00692   ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&i_lo, abs(spin), 0);
00693   for (i=i_lo; i<L*L; i++) 
00694     flm[i] = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0) + I * (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00695 
00696 }
00697 
00698 
00711 double ran2_dp(int idum) {
00712 
00713   int IM1=2147483563,IM2=2147483399,IMM1=IM1-1, 
00714     IA1=40014,IA2=40692,IQ1=53668,IQ2=52774,IR1=12211,IR2=3791, 
00715     NTAB=32,NDIV=1+IMM1/NTAB;
00716 
00717   double AM=1./IM1,EPS=1.2e-7,RNMX=1.-EPS;
00718   int j,k;
00719   static int iv[32],iy,idum2 = 123456789; 
00720   // N.B. in C static variables are initialised to 0 by default.
00721 
00722   if (idum <= 0) {
00723     idum= (-idum>1 ? -idum : 1); // max(-idum,1);
00724     idum2=idum;
00725     for(j=NTAB+8;j>=1;j--) {
00726       k=idum/IQ1;
00727       idum=IA1*(idum-k*IQ1)-k*IR1;
00728       if (idum < 0) idum=idum+IM1;
00729       if (j < NTAB) iv[j-1]=idum;
00730     }
00731     iy=iv[0];
00732   }
00733   k=idum/IQ1;
00734   idum=IA1*(idum-k*IQ1)-k*IR1;
00735   if (idum < 0) idum=idum+IM1;
00736   k=idum2/IQ2;
00737   idum2=IA2*(idum2-k*IQ2)-k*IR2;
00738   if (idum2 < 0) idum2=idum2+IM2;
00739   j=1+iy/NDIV;
00740   iy=iv[j-1]-idum2;
00741   iv[j-1]=idum;
00742   if(iy < 1)iy=iy+IMM1;
00743   return (AM*iy < RNMX ? AM*iy : RNMX); // min(AM*iy,RNMX);
00744 
00745 }
